name: blueprint_background.jpg
description: Image of a dark, moody, full background featuring faint, light-blue technical blueprint lines overlaid on a textured, deep navy surface, creating a subtle, atmospheric look.

name: key.png
description: Image of a single, highly ornate, antique key made of glowing brass, standing vertically and shot straight-on, with a white background. The key should emit a soft, magical yellow light, highlighting its intricate details.

name: failure_stamp.png
description: Image of a grunge-style rubber stamp imprint of the word 'FAILURE' in bold, distressed, capital letters, with a white background. The color should be a stark, slightly faded red, with an uneven, textured ink application.

name: calendar_2019.png
description: Image of a single, realistic calendar page for the year '2019', with a white background. The paper should be slightly off-white, with dog-eared corners and subtle creases to look slightly worn.

name: ghostly_phone.png
description: Image of a generic, modern smartphone that appears semi-transparent and ghostly, with a white background. It should have a subtle, ethereal blue glow, looking like a fading apparition.

name: fire_phone.png
description: A clean, high-resolution product shot of the original Amazon Fire Phone, standing vertically and facing forward, with a white background. The lighting should be professional and even, highlighting the phone's design.

name: tech_stage_background.jpg
description: Image of a full background showing a dark, empty stage at a large tech conference. The stage is dimly lit except for a single, bright, white spotlight shining on the center.

name: cracked_glass.png
description: Image of a shattered glass texture overlay, with a white background. The cracks should originate from a central impact point and spread outwards realistically across the frame.

name: stock_chart_down.png
description: Image of a stylized stock market line graph, with a white background. The line is a bold, vibrant red, starting high on the left and plummeting dramatically downwards to the right.

name: newspaper_clipping.png
description: Image of a rectangular, generic newspaper clipping with ragged, torn edges and a white background. The paper should have a yellowish, aged texture, and the text should be generic lorem ipsum in columns.

name: apple_logo_silhouette.png
description: Image of a solid black silhouette of the iconic Apple logo with the bite taken out, with a white background. The silhouette should be clean and sharp with no texture.

name: google_logo_silhouette.png
description: Image of a solid black silhouette of the Google 'G' logo, with a white background. The silhouette should be perfectly clean and sharp.

name: bezos_portrait.jpg
description: A high-contrast, black and white portrait photo of Jeff Bezos. He should have a determined, focused expression, looking directly at the camera with dramatic, chiaroscuro-style lighting.

name: sunrise_background.jpg
description: Image of a full background showing a beautiful, hopeful sunrise. The sun is cresting over a distant mountain horizon, casting vibrant orange and golden light across the sky with visible lens flare.

name: brain_connections.png
description: Image of a stylized, semi-transparent human brain viewed from the side, with a white background. It features a complex network of glowing blue and white neural pathways and synapses.

name: engineers_team.png
description: Image of a small, diverse team of engineers in smart-casual attire, standing and collaborating around an invisible point of focus, with a white background. They appear engaged, pointing and discussing.

name: supply_chain_diagram.png
description: Image of a complex, futuristic flowchart representing a supply chain, with a white background. It consists of interconnected nodes and pathways glowing with a bright cyan light, like a hologram.

name: repurpose_symbol.png
description: Image of the universal recycling symbol with three chasing arrows, with a white background. The arrows are a vibrant, glowing neon green, emitting a soft light.

name: echo_blueprint.png
description: Image of a technical blueprint drawing of the first-generation Amazon Echo device, with a white background. The image features white lines and annotations showing internal components in a schematic style.

name: amazon_echo.png
description: A clean product shot of the first-generation, tall, cylindrical black Amazon Echo device, shot from a slight front-angle perspective, with a white background. The lighting is professional with no reflections.

name: alexa_logo.png
description: Image of the official Amazon Alexa logo, which is a light-blue speech bubble containing a white circle, with a white background. The colors are brand-standard and the edges are sharp.

name: smart_home_background.jpg
description: Image of a full background of a modern, stylish living room in the evening. The lighting is warm and inviting, with subtle smart home elements like a smart thermostat or speaker.

name: ashes.png
description: Image of a small, realistic pile of fine, light-grey ashes, shot from a slightly elevated side angle, with a white background. The texture is detailed, with some small embers within the pile.

name: sprout.png
description: Image of a single, vibrant green sprout with two small leaves, emerging from a tiny clump of dark soil, with a white background. The sprout looks healthy and fresh.

name: success_tree.png
description: Image of a large, majestic, flourishing oak tree with a thick, strong trunk and a full, vibrant green canopy, with a white background. The tree appears perfectly healthy and symmetrical.

name: bright_sky_background.jpg
description: Image of a full background of a clear, bright, optimistic blue sky on a sunny day. A few wispy, fluffy white clouds are scattered around.

name: dust_overlay.png
description: Image of a subtle texture overlay of tiny, out-of-focus dust particles floating in the air, appearing as small bright specks, with a white background.
